About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I have always had a strong interest in technology and IT. My first programming attemps started at school and university, but at the beginning of 2017 my passion moved to the next level. I was working full time in non-IT environment and during my days off and weekends, I started reading and studied more about front-end programming. I have done my research and joined many free online platforms, where I could communicate and discuss with other members, also start on first codes and finally creating project at the end of 2017. I wanted to start coding on professional level, which led me to coding course in July 2018, where I improved and learnt new coding areas and it also allowed to work on projects which you can find on Github. Now my main goal is to apply gained skills in working environment, as I strive it to become my work career. I am very hard working person with strong communication skills. I enjoy working in group projects, brainstorming, problem solving and I have got good eye to details. I am very flexible when it comes to learning new technologies and I am always open to new challenges. Because I am a good listener, I always try onboard any constructive criticism and feedback, as I know it is the key part of learning curve and my personal growth.

MY PAST

I finished university in Poland and gained a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Management at Lublin University of Technology. I think I was not mature enough or maybe way too scared to make the right decision because I struggled with the choice between Management and Computer Science. It is not like I am not grateful for this higher education because every new experience can teach me something about myself, although computers have accompanied me from my youngest years. I still remember when my mother gave my yellow book with general knowledge which included information about how to build a computer and networks. That event put a mark on me and has slowly evolved to the final stage. So right now I would like to challenge myself and I am proud that this time I am doing something that is really important for me.

INTEREST

I believe that I am realistic person who is strong enough emotionally to survive any pressure from bad environment. I am good listener with honest attitude to people(sometimes way too straightforward :D) . I am passionate about developing myself so I always try to find opportunities to learn every day. My main activities are programming, running, street workout, reading books and technological news, collecting vinyl records, playing electric guitar, photography. Another thing worth mentioning is that I really appreciate knowledgeable and experienced people who sacrifice their free time to share all their abilities and skills with others. One day I would like to be like one of them and inspire people to focus what is really important in particular area of life.

FUTURE PLANS

My dream is to be a full stack developer with design and graphics skills. Moreover I try to think like a visionary person so I would like to continue my path with artificial intelligence. AL is moving rapidly from relevancy in technologically niche areas to impacting every industry in the world. My main goal is to create a robot or application that could really help children with autism. I know robots like this already exist but they are not perfect. Basically that area is not explored enough(especially in eastern Europe) so I would like to put tremendous work and make it better. This has came from my personal experience because I know someone who has autism so that is not an empty promise. I know how hard is life when you live with autistic child. This disorder has had a big influence on my close family and has changed their life dramatically. So if I could only have the chance to obtain necessary knowledge I will sacrifice myself on that project.
